hadiths.text: Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri narrated:"A man from Banu Khudrah and a man from Banu Amr bin Awf were disputing about the Masjid that was founded upon Taqwa. The man from Banu Khudrah said: 'It is the Masjid of Allah's Messenger.' The other one said that it was Masjid Qub. So they went to ask Allah's Messenger about that. He said: 'It is this - meaning his Masjid - 'and in that one (Masjid Quba) there is much good

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ الَّذِي أُسِّسَ عَلَى التَّقْوَى
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Masjid Founded Upon Taqwa
